title: Calories in Brie Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in brie cheese per 100g, including fat, protein, carbs, sodium, and quick tweaks for your diet.
assumptions: Full-fat, soft-ripened cow's milk brie, average commercial variety, rind included but not eaten.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, aging, and portion size. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of brie cheese provides ~334 kcal, mostly from fat, with 21g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Rind removed (minimal impact, but slight fat reduction)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz of brie cheese?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for 28g (1 oz) of brie cheese.

faqs.q: Is brie cheese high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~28g total fat per 100g, with 17g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein in brie cheese?

faqs.a: Very low, only 0.5g carbs per 100g, no fiber.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in brie?
faqs.a: Due to salt in the cheesemaking process; ~629mg per 100g.
